In addition to "Shenwei Lingzhuang Five Fans", the game is located in the ocean cell at the beginning, land units can board ships and have the ability to enter the ocean cell, and pioneers can build cities in the sea area. +2 [ICON_Science] technology value and +2 [ICON_Culture] culture value every round before opening up the first city. Not subject to flood damage. [NEWLINE] Merchant units have +50% movement range in water and can board boats immediately after unlocking.
Ratatosk

Except for the "Shenwei Lingzhuang Five Fans", all units have +10 [ICON_Strength] combat power when attacking, and -5 [ICON_Strength] combat power when defending. Obtain a member of the Ratatosk Agency in ancient times.
jack pumpkin

In addition to "Shenwei Lingzhuang Five Fans", the [ICON_Loyalty] loyalty coefficient of the citizens of the home city increases, and the allies get part of the benefits, and the [ICON_Loyalty] loyalty coefficient of the citizens of foreign cities decreases, and the effect of the enemy city is doubled.
festival

In addition to "Shenwei Lingzhuang Five Fans", cities with a sense of happiness can get an additional +5% [ICON_Science] technology value. A happy city gets +1 [ICON_GreatScientist] Great Scientist points for every academy it has. Cities with ecstatic happiness get double the bonus.
Ｌｏｓ！Ｌｏｓ！Ｌｏｓ！

Except for "Shenwei Lingzhuang Fifth Fan", each city will not generate war weariness. A city with a garrison unit gets +3 [ICON_Loyalty] loyalty every round, and if the garrison is a legion or an army, it gets +5 [ICON_Loyalty] loyalty.
treasure hunter

Except for "Shenwei Lingzhuang·Five Fans", when military units fight with more advanced units, +7 [ICON_Strength] combat power, and military units are strengthened when developing future technologies. Unique building for Captain Kotori, which replaces the Flood Levee. [NEWLINE]Protect the city's coastal lowlands and riverside floodplain tiles from flooding. The initial construction cost and maintenance cost per turn will be determined according to the number of coastal lowlands in this city and the current sea level. If built after a city tile has been flooded, it will fully restore those tiles. But submerged cells cannot be recovered. [NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Food] Food and +1 [ICON_Production] Production in all floodplain tiles. [NEWLINE]Must be built in a city with one or more coastal lowland tiles. If the city is occupied, it will not be plundered.

ha! ? You, what nonsense are you talking about! (A declaration of friendship was issued.)

ha! ? (Rejected friendship declaration with Itsuka Kotori.)
It seems that you want to become a star in the sky. (An open declaration of war against Wuhe Kotori.)

love you! elder brother. (Accepted as a special envoy to visit.)
What are you thinking idiot! (The special envoy's visit was denied.)

Do you want to push your limits! (A statement of reproach was made by Kotori Wuhe.)
love you! elder brother. (The establishment of the embassy has been accepted.)

ha! ? How could you refuse Kotori's request? (Refused to open an embassy.)
Hehe, I'm so cute. Why, with that expression, can't even think of words of praise?

uh, what did you say? (Refused to form an alliance.)

Cute girl with red hair and twin ponytails. Because he wanted to protect his brother, he became a flame spirit after receiving the "power to become stronger" given by <Phantom> five years ago.
